titleStmt.title: A Declaration of several of the Churches of Christ, and godly people in and about the citie of London; concerning the kingly interest of Christ, and the present suffrings of his cause and saints in England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Livewel Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
